3 Compound Documents and OLE Controls in DUIM

3.7 The DUIM-OLE-CONTROL module

This section contains a reference entry for the items that the DUIM-OLE-Control module exports from the DUIM-OLE-Control library.

DUIM-OLE-Control also re-exports all the items from the DUIM-OLE-Server and OLE-Control-Framework libraries. See "The DUIM-OLE-SERVER module" on page 145 and "The OLE-CONTROL-FRAMEWORK module" on page 337 for those reference entries.

initialize-ole-control
max-storage-size
<ocx-dispatch>
ocx-frame
3.7.1 - Getting the ambient properties of the control's container
3.7.2 - Automatically generated control properties
